raw_comment:
I noticed that women were likelier to reach out to people than men. I wonder why this is. I feel I'm not on my phone as much as my peers.
Headline: Who's calling?
ace_sentences: I noticed that women were more likely to reach out to people than men.
I wonder why women were more likely to reach out to people than men.
I feel that I am not on my phone as much as my peers are on their phones.
The headline is: Who is calling?
